backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing leads in a map with add, get, and list query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two navigation-related features to affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend components, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH variable definitions for theming, including dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and the root React app container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling client-side routing and rendering homepage sections or standalone pages.
frontend/src/components/contact/CompanyP: Dialog form for downloading the company profile, validating input and submitting a lead before triggering download.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactO: Renders a grid of contact options including scheduling a call, downloading a company profile, sending an email, and WhatsApp messaging with dialog handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright, attribution, and a Caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/forms/ControlLea: A lead generation form collecting company and contact details with validation, submits data through useLeadSubmission, and shows a success screen.
frontend/src/components/forms/FounderCon: Form for Founder Control Blueprint inquiries capturing business details and bottlenecks, validating fields, and submitting via useLeadSubmission with a success message.
frontend/src/components/forms/Industries: Lead form for industry blueprint requests gathering business info and bottlenecks, performing validation, submitting via useLeadSubmission, and showing a confirmation.
frontend/src/components/forms/InsightsNe: Newsletter subscription form validating basic user and company info, submitting via useLeadSubmission, and displaying a subscription confirmation.
frontend/src/components/forms/ProcessLea: Form component collecting lead info for process inquiries with validation and submission via useLeadSubmission.
frontend/src/components/forms/StrategySe: Form for strategy session applications including company details, bottlenecks, and system info, submitted through useLeadSubmission.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact details and a CTA button to schedule a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/Control: Showcases the CONTROL framework steps with images and a read‑more navigation action.
frontend/src/components/sections/Emotion: Section highlighting founder dependency issues with persuasive messaging.
frontend/src/components/sections/FinalCt: Final call‑to‑action section prompting users to book a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section rendering a full‑screen background and the HeroSlider.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSli: Interactive hero slider with swipe support, multiple slides, and CTAs linking to pages or triggering calls.
frontend/src/components/sections/Industr: Renders a section listing four target industries with icons, titles, and descriptions in card format.
frontend/src/components/sections/Insight: Displays a grid of insight cards with category, title, excerpt, and a call‑to‑action link.
frontend/src/components/sections/Outcome: Shows key business outcomes in a checklist layout alongside an illustrative dashboard image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Problem: Presents common business problems as icon‑labeled items followed by a highlighted systems‑problem message.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Outlines a four‑step transformation process with numbered cards and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIno: Introduces three core features—Control, Clarity, Continuity—with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with hash and route navigation, scroll tracking, and strategy call button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Defines a lead submission handler that sends form data to the backend via the actor and manages UI state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Returns whether the user prefers reduced motion using a media query listener.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base file defining theme color variables, dark mode settings, and custom utilities for layout, visuals, and motion reduction.
frontend/src/lib/contactConfig.ts: Exports contact configuration placeholders and centralized contact email/phone constants.
frontend/src/lib/strategyCall.ts: Provides a helper that navigates to the strategy session page via client-side routing and scrolls to top.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements the Contact page with hero section, contact options, an inquiry form, and qualification criteria.
Renders the CONTROL framework page with hero, explanation sections, and scroll-to lead gen functionality.
frontend/src/pages/IndustriesPage.tsx: Describes industries served, featuring hero, industry focus, and scroll-triggered lead generation sections.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Renders Insights page including hero visuals, categorized content topics, and featured article previews.
frontend/src/pages/ProcessPage.tsx: Renders a multi-section marketing page describing the company’s process, including a hero CTA and structured content blocks. Uses UI components and styling for layout and showcases the 4‑stage process.
frontend/src/pages/StrategySessionPage.t: Implements the Strategy Session application page with hero content, eligibility sections, and a scroll-to-form handler. Contains the form container and supporting UI components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and brand-specific palette extensions. Defines theme extensions, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, existing features, and new feature requests related to navigation and routing for the Strategy Session page.
